title: Spicy prawn linguine with garlic, tomato and herbs
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/4 teaspoon dried crushed chillies (or to taste)', '4 raw tiger prawns (or 10 medium prawns), peeled and deveined', '6 cherry tomatoes, halved', '50ml dry white wine', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '150ml linguine - cooked according to packet instructions and drained']
